hero.title: Automate Your eBay Dropshipping Business
hero.description: ProfitTrack centralizes product management, listing automation, order tracking, smart pricing, and analytics — all in one powerful dashboard.

features.title: Everything You Need to Scale
features.description: ProfitTrack replaces spreadsheets, manual repricing, and missed orders with a centralized automation platform.

items.title: Product Database
items.description: Manage your entire product catalog with auto-calculated pricing, category filtering, and profit tracking per product.

items.title: eBay Listing Automation
items.description: Create SEO-optimized eBay listings with auto-generated titles and descriptions. Publish directly from your dashboard.

items.title: Order Tracking
items.description: Receive and track orders with full status flow: New, Ordered, Shipped, Delivered. See profit per order in real-time.

items.title: Smart Pricing
items.description: Track competitor prices and automatically adjust your listings to stay competitive while protecting your margins.

items.title: Analytics Dashboard
items.description: Monitor total revenue, net profit, sell-through rate, top products, and worst performers — all at a glance.

items.title: Webhook Integration
items.description: Receive eBay order notifications automatically via webhooks. Orders are saved, profit calculated, and stats updated instantly.

testimonials.title: Built for eBay Sellers
testimonials.description: ProfitTrack is designed for dropshippers who want to scale without spreadsheets.

items.quote: No more spreadsheets to track orders. ProfitTrack gives me instant visibility into every sale, its profit, and where it stands in the shipping process.
The auto-pricing feature alone saves me hours each week. I can track competitors and let the system adjust my prices automatically while protecting my margins.
From listing creation to order fulfillment, everything is in one place. I scaled from 50 to 500 listings without any extra tools.

cta.title: Start Managing Your eBay Business
cta.description: No spreadsheets. No missed orders. No manual repricing. Everything centralized.
